name: Christopherlarsen.GitHub.io
body:
### We all forget things from time to time ...
We're human. But every time we forget a birthday, an important meeting or directions where you are going, we pay the price.

```
Triggerfishh will remember every conversation you have.
```

Sometimes you won't even know it at the time, but something that didn't seem important you will wish you paid attention to later.

### Always on
You don't have to do anything.

### Fully Automatic
Triggerfish is there in the background, doing it's thing. Sit back and relax, its got your back.

### Voice Commands
Set custom URL's from your favourite service like If This Then That (IFTTT) or Zapier, to execute on specific keywords you create. Then just leave your phone in your pocket, Triggerfish will do your bidding, all you need to do is ask.

### Imagine the things you can do with CONTEXT
With the online API Triggerfish can let the world know when you are busy or sleeping, or when it's ok to bother you with notifications and messages. When you are in trouble, just yell for help, and Triggerfish will alert someone you know that you are in trouble.

### Release Date
May 2015 on the Apple App Store and Online.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
